{{wip|Reverse calculating the needed armor and toughness given damage}}
This tool calculates how much damage a given amount of armor protects against, with some other parameters. The outputs are rounded to 2 decimal places.

<onlyinclude>
<div style="border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px; display: block; width: 100%; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;" class="calculator-container">
'''Calculate percent damage reduction and damage taken'''
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem;">
{{simplecalc label|{{tooltip|Armor|See &quot;Armor&quot; in item tooltip}}:|for=armor}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|id=armor|type=number|default=0|min=0|max=30|step=1|decimals=0|class-live=cdx-text-input__input}}</div>
</div>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 0.2em;">
{{simplecalc label|{{tooltip|Armor toughness|See &quot;Armor Toughness&quot; in item tooltip}}:|for=armortoughness}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|id=armortoughness|type=number|default=0|min=0|max=20|step=1|decimals=0|class-live=cdx-text-input__input}}</div>
</div>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 0.2em;">
{{simplecalc label|[[Breach]] level:|for=breach}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|id=breach|type=number|default=0|min=0|max=255|step=1|decimals=0|class-live=cdx-text-input__input}}</div>
</div>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 0.2em;">
{{simplecalc label|Weapon damage:|for=damage}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|id=damage|type=number|default=0|min=0|class-live=cdx-text-input__input}}</div>
</div>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 0.2em;">
{{simplecalc label|Percent damage reduction:}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|type=plain|default=0|formula=max(0, (min(20, max(armor/5, armor - (4*damage)/(min(armortoughness, 20)+8)))/25)-breach*0.15)*100|decimals=2}}</div>
</div>
<div style="display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 0.2em;">
{{simplecalc label|Damage taken:}} <div class="cdx-text-input">
{{simplecalc|type=plain|default=0|formula=damage*(1 - max(0, (min(20, max(armor/5, armor - (4*damage)/(min(armortoughness, 20)+8)))/25)-breach*0.15))|decimals=2}}</div>
</div>
</div>
</onlyinclude>
